note.p: Birth: Leomil, Moimenta da Beira, Viseu, Portugal, Europe (27 November 1735)
Death: Belém, Lisbon, Lisboa, Portugal, Europe (14 April 1804)

Career: Governor of the captaincy of Mato Grosso, Brazil (1769-1772) resigned due to ophthalmia; Portuguese minister at the Court of Great Britain (1774-1788); Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs and War, Portugal (1788-1801); made Viscount of Balsemão (1801); Secretary of State for Internal Affairs of the Kingdom, Portugal - de facto Prime Minister (1801-1804); organized military hospitals; introduced a geodetical survey in Portugal
Honours: Commander of the Order of Avis
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Wikipedia; Dicionário Histórico, Corográfico, Heráldico, Biográfico, Bibliográfico, Numismático e Artístico
